General.Name: ZYF Lopsking Aluminum Co Ltd
General.Description: ZYF Lopsking Aluminum Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of aluminum extrusion profiles in China. It also offers intelligent building engineering service. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Lopsking Aluminum Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ZYF Lopsking Aluminum Co., Ltd. in December 2020. ZYF Lopsking Aluminum Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Suzhou, China.

2.Name: Mr. Jian  Shi
2.Title: Sec. of The Board & Deputy GM
